bio:
I graduated on computer science. Since 2000, I work with Java, as a consultant and architect for commercial projects.
Started working on Apache ServiceMix since 2005 as a committer.

I own the following certifications:

- Oracle Certified Master, Java EE 5 Enterprise Architect
- Sun Certified Enterprise Architect for J2EE 1.4
- Sun Certified Business Component Developer for Java EE Platform 5
- Sun Certified Web Component Developer for Java EE Platform 5
- Sun Certified Java Programmer for Java 1.2
- Microsoft Certified Professional for Windows 2000 / Server
- JCompany Certified Architect
- Red Hat Advanced SOA Developer (JBoss ESB, JBPM, Drools and RestEasy)
name: George Gastaldi
